moves.1. e4 d5 2. exd5 Nf6 3. d4 Bg4 4. Nf3 Qx: I offered a draw, while making the next movie, which was really a blunder, hehe
moves.36... axb5 37. Ke3 Qc1+: he took 30 minutes to make the next move, for some reason.  He said there was a perpetual as he didn't want me to take the a2 pawn.  Frankly, I wouldn't have taken it, as it looses the e, e, and b pawns.
moves.38. Kxe4 Qc6+ 39. Ke3 Qxg2 40. Qe4+: this seems like a pretty stupid move to me, but what do I know.
moves.40... Qxe4+ 41. Kxe4: Fun fact: I thought I lost because of a5 - it took me 10 minutes to figure out that I could push to b4 - I clearly don't understand how pawns work.
moves.41... b4 42. Kd4 h5 43. Kc4: And here I blundered, wait for it.
moves.43... g4: I was convinced that the pawn has to take.  I honestly didn't think that he could play h4.  How blind am I.  I was sure I had won, hehe.  If I had played h5 instead, I think that was a win.
moves.44. h4: so, after that blunder, I committed another!
